Figure Humanoid Robot.text:
WHAT: Figure humanoid robot bringing AI to life.
CATEGORY: AI robotics.
FEATURES: Height: 5'6"; Payload: 20kg; Weight: 70kg; Runtime: 5hr; Speed: 1.2M/S; System: Electric.
CAPABILITIES: General purpose humanoid; autonomous operations; end-to-end operations; household tasks; learning and performing tasks safely.
STAGE: Early stages of commercialization.
NOTE: Figure is poised to solve labor shortages and is learning and performing end-to-end operations safely.

company.text:
NAME: Figure AI Robotics Company.
CONTACT: Not explicitly provided.
LOCATION: Not explicitly provided.
POSITIONING: World leader in AI & Humanoid experience; bringing impossible ideas to life; solving labor shortages; applications in manufacturing, logistics, warehousing, and retail.
